jobDescription: Job Description As a part of the corporate development team, the Business Development Analyst will oversee the development of strategic market/product line business plans and marketing programs to support sales in designated market segments. The Business Development Analyst will work to identify volume and strategic customers and develop partnerships. Additional duties to include: Analyze market data to identify trends/opportunitiesDevelop strategic direction from market information, and creates compelling market analysis presentations.May conduct make-versus-buy analysis from a partnership/merger/acquisition perspectiveMonitor financial and operational conditions of companies and industry dynamicsIdentifies volume and strategic customers and develops partnerships Job Requirements  Required Certifications and Training Bachelors Degree (or equivalent experience) and/or 2-5 years of related intern experience or Masters Degree with no or little experience.
